navbar.name: Felipe
home.p: Graduated in Henry Bootcamp with +800 hours of programming based on practices and real projects. Currently I love working on web applications using technologies like React, Redux and Node JS and mobile apps using React Native.
about.iamtext: Full Stack Web developer with a passion for creating beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences. With 2 years of experience in the field. I am always looking for innovative ways to bring my clients' visions to life.
about.metext: Whether I'm working on a website or mobile app, I bring my commitment to design excellence and user-centered thinking to every project I work on. I look forward to the opportunity to bring my skills and passion to your next project.
